    • Constructor Detail

      • ScorbotER3

        public ScorbotER3(processing.core.PApplet _myParent,
          String _portName,
          int _baudRate)
        Initializes the library.
        Parameters:
        _myParent - Parent PApplet.
        _portName - Name of the serial port connected to the Scorbot control box.
        _baudRate - Serial port baud rate.

    • Method Detail

      • moveClaw

        public void moveClaw(int _encoderPulses)
        Opens and closes the claw.
        Parameters:
        _encoderPulses - Amount of rotation in digital encoder pulses, from -8000 to 8000.

      • rotateWrist

        public void rotateWrist(int _encoderPulses)
        Rotates the wrist.
        Parameters:
        _encoderPulses - Amount of rotation in digital encoder pulses, from -8000 to 8000.

        Parameters:

      • moveMotor

        public void moveMotor(int _motorNumber,
             int _encoderPulses)
        Moves a specific motor (shouldn't be used to move a joint, as some rely on multiple motors).
        Parameters:
        _motorNumber - Motor number, from 1 to 8.
        _encoderPulses - Amount of rotation in digital encoder pulses, from -8000 to 8000.

      • stopMotor

        public void stopMotor(int _motorNumber)
        Stops a specific motor.
        Parameters:
        _motorNumber - Motor number, from 1 to 8.

      • motorSpeed

        public void motorSpeed(int _motorNumber,
              int _motorSpeed)
        Sets a specific motor's speed.
        Parameters:
        _motorNumber - Motor number, from 1 to 8.
        _motorSpeed - Motor speed, from 1 (slowest) to 9, or 0 (fastest).

      • setOutput

        public void setOutput(int _outputNumber)
        Enables a specific output.
        Parameters:
        _outputNumber - Output Number, from 1 to 8.

      • resetOutput

        public void resetOutput(int _outputNumber)
        Disables a specific output.
        Parameters:
        _outputNumber - Output Number, from 1 to 8.

      • emergencyBrake

        public void emergencyBrake()
        Emergency brake all motors (requires hitting the reset button on the control box).
